description: Running tracker of public statements by large software companies quantifying AI's impact

statements.statement: Agentforce deployed to 1,000+ enterprise customers; AI-attributed revenue growing 'faster than any product in company history'
AI-generated content now covers 80%+ of new course material; reduced content creation costs significantly while expanding language offerings
AIP platform drove commercial revenue growth of 54% YoY; US commercial revenue up 64%
